title: Virtual Dental Assistant
salary: $5 per hour in the first 3 months and $6 per hour in the succeeding months
job_overview:
Position Type: Full-Time
Work Hours: 9:00 AM – 6:00 PM CST
Work Days: Monday – Friday
Salary: $5 - $6 per hour, depending on experience


Position Summary
We are looking for a cheerful, outgoing, and professional Virtual Dental Assistant to join our team and support our front office operations. You will play a vital role in patient communication, appointment scheduling, insurance verification, and general administrative support. This is a remote position that requires prior experience in dental administration and a strong command of dental software and systems.

Key Responsibilities
Manage patient scheduling within the EHR system, Practice Works
Conduct follow-ups and recall calls for unscheduled treatments and recare appointments
Confirm upcoming appointments by phone and other communication platforms
Verify dental insurance coverage and input accurate data and billing codes into the system
Provide courteous, professional responses to patient inquiries via phone and messaging
Support administrative tasks such as document uploads, data entry, and patient record management
Use platforms such as Weave, Vyne, and insurance websites to support daily operations
Ensure a positive, empathetic patient experience in all interactions
Be flexible with working hours to handle off-hour recalls or scheduling as needed

Experience Requirements

Required:
Prior experience working as a virtual assistant in a dental or medical setting
Experience with dental EHR systems (Practice Works, Dentrix, or similar)
Familiarity with insurance verification and dental billing procedures

Preferred but not required:
Medical/dental-related education or certification
Experience with software platforms like Weave, Vyne, and using insurance provider websites
Background in a clinical dental office setting

Please use ITALY as your sublject line
Additional Application Requirement:
Include a professional intro video/audio, providing your work experience related to this role (2mins. max.)
Provide your most recent CV
